1.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's apartment, Phoebe is helping Joey rehearse for an audition.
Phoebe is overacting her part.

lines.Line:
The reactor’s gonna blow in three seconds, we’re never gonna
make it
You’ve got to get out of here! Save yourself
Don’t worry about me, I’m a robot! I’m just a machine!
No you’re not! Not to me
No you’re not! Not to me
(she stops reading from the script) Oh my God
Yeah, you’re great! Okay, let’s take it from
Yeah, you’re great! Okay, let’s take it from
(interrupting) No, I mean I was really acting my ass off
Yeah, I thought I was pretty good too
Oh yeah, you’re solid. Yeah, you’re just no me
Oh yeah, you’re solid. Yeah, you’re just no me

Y’know what? I think that’s enough for now. Yeah. I don’t
want to be over rehearsed

(tremendously overacting) Fine! I’ll do it without you! (Joey gives
her thumbs up) I don’t need you or anybody else! I’m gonna make it on my own!
(Joey closes the door to his bedroom.) You’ll see!! You’ll all see!!

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, everyone is there to watch Joey's first scene as Dr. Drake
Remoray.

lines.Line: nbsp; Whoa, she's pretty. (Mentioning the girl on TV

nbsp; Yeah, and oh she's really nice too. She taught me all about how to
work the cameras, and smell-the-fart acting

nbsp; It's like, you got so many lines to learn so fast, that sometimes
you need a minute to remember your next one. So while you're thinkin' of it, you take this
big pause where you look all intense, you know, like this. (Does this intense look where
it looks like he's smelling a fart.

(there's a gunshot on TV) There's my scene, there's my scene. [Joey on tv] "Mrs. Wallace, I'm Dr. Drake Ramoray, your sister's neurosurgeon.  I'm afraid the situation is much worse than we expected. Your sister is suffering from a..." (Does the smell-the-fart look.

lines.Character: >The One With The Butt.  The gang is watching Joey in Freud!

lines.Line:

here, and I vould have to say, your pwoblem is qviiite clear. (He goes into a song and
dance number.)

lines.Character:
All you want is a dingle,
What you envy's a schwang,

lines.Character: [The next flashback is also from <a href=
>The One With The Butt and it's also on the soundtrack.  He's Joey telling everyone about his big break in Monica and Rachel's apartment.

lines.Line:
nbsp; I play Al Pacino's butt. All right? He goes into the shower, and then- I'm his butt.

Monica: (trying not to laugh) Oh my God.

Joey:  C'mon, you guys. This is a real movie, and Al Pacino's in it, and that's big!

Chandler: Oh no, it's terrific, it's- it's- y'know, you deserve this, after all your years of struggling, you've finally been able to crack your way into show business.

Joey: Okay, okay, fine! Make jokes, I don't care! This is a big break for me!

Ross: You're right, you're right, it is
nbsp; So you gonna invite us all to the big opening

lines.Character: [Cut back to Joey about to leave for his audition for Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E
lines.Line: Cut back to Joey about to leave for his audition for Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
All right well, I’m outta here. Wish me luck

luck! We all wish you good luuuuuuuuck!!!</i

lines.Line:

WENUS and I'm not happy

4.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's apartment, Chandler is there talking to the chick and duck.

lines.Line: Oh come on guys, it’s not like I moved to Europe! I just moved across the hall! And we would have you over all the time if it weren’t for (struggles to get this out) Monica’s allergies. (The duck quacks.) You’re right, I could never lie to you. She hates you. (The phone rings.) Should I get that? (Laughs, then answers the phone.) Hello? (Listens) Uh no, Joey’s not here right now. Can I take a message? (Listens) Yeah, okay so the audition has been moved from 5:00 to 2:30? (Listens) Okay great. (Listens.) Bye. (Hangs up the phone and goes to write the message on the Magna-Doodle on the door but Monica walks in and forces him to jump out of the way.
(looks down at his clothes) Am I naked again?
We’re supposed to meet my parents in 15 minutes
We’re supposed to meet my parents in 15 minutes

Yeah okay, I was just talking to the guys. Just look at them I mean,
is it okay if they come visit

Oh right, your allergies. (Monica leaves and to the chick and duck)
All her, she hates you. (Chandler leaves without finishing the message for Joey.

5.SceneDescription: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Monica and Rachel are consoling Chandler.

lines.Line: I can’t believe I did this! What an idiot

Oh, stop beating yourself up! People make mistakes! These things happen!
There aren’t any message you’ve forgotten to give me are there? (Chandler has a
disgusted look on his face.) Apparently you’re not very good at it! I
Do you think he’ll ever forgive me
Do you think he’ll ever forgive me

Of course he will! But Chandler the most important thing is you forgive
yourself
Already? That’s pretty bad what you did

Y’know what? He will forgive you. And I like to bring a pad
with me when I go answer the phone just in case… (Chandler gets that disgusted look
back.) Okay
You didn’t see how mad he was, y’know
You didn’t see how mad he was, y’know

I’m sure he will forgive you. Look, we have all been there!
Y’know, you fight, you make up, it’s just the way it works

lines.Character:
[We then go into another set of flashbacks of famous fights. The first is the second
breakup of Ross and Rachel from The One With The Jellyfish
lines.Line:
We then go into another set of flashbacks of famous fights. The first is the second
breakup of Ross and Rachel from The One With The Jellyfish.
It took two people to break up this relationship!
It took two people to break up this relationship!

Yeah! You and that girl from that copy place, which yesterday you took
full responsibility for!

I didn’t know what I was taking full responsibility for! Okay?! I
didn’t finish the whole letter

It was 5:30 in the morning, and you had rambled on for 18 pages. Front and
back!! (they go into the living room, trapping Monica, Chandler, and Joey in the kitchen)
(to Rachel) Oh-oh-oh, and by the way, Y-O-U-apostrophe-R-E means ‘you are,’
Y-O-U-R means ‘your!

Y'know I can’t believe I even thought about getting back
together again! We are so over!

(starts to cry) FINE BY ME!! (he opens the door and traps Chandler behind
it

(starts to cry) FINE BY ME!! (he opens the door and traps Chandler behind
it

And hey! Just so you know, it’s not that common! It doesn’t
happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!
(coming out from behind the door) I KNEW IT!!!
(coming out from behind the door) I KNEW IT!!!

lines.Character: >The One After The Superbowl, Part II.  Monica and Rachel are fighting over who gets to see Jean-Claude Van Damme.

lines.Line: You had no right to go out with him
You had no right to go out with him
I did not sell you out
I did not sell you out
Yes you did.  You absolutely sold me..

OK, well, you wouldn't let me finish and I was jus- [Monica flicks her
back] Ow. That hurt [flicks Monica

lines.Line: They keep flicking each other. This turns into slapping each other.
Oh!  All right.  Now, let's not do this
Rachel tackles Monica onto the couch.

lines.Character: >The One Where Eddie Moves In.   It's the sequence where Joey and Chandler are both saddened that they're not living together anymore. All By Myself is playing in the background.

6.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's apartment, Joey is entering to find Chandler waiting
patiently for him.

lines.Line: Please tell me you got the message

The actor playing Mac couldn’t do it, they needed to see you at 2
o’clock

Du-du-I wrote it, I wrote it on the board! I wrote it on the board,
then I went all over New York City looking for ya! I went to Ross’s! I went to the
coffeehouse! I went to any place that they made sandwiches
Sorry! I-I-I don’t know what to say

Well you-you-you-you might say congratulations! I saw the board! I went to
the audition! I got the part!

(angrily) Is that supposed to be funny! I was really worried over
here
Y’know, sometimes that fake out thing is just mean
Oh wow! Okay man, I’m sorry. I did not mean to make you feel bad

Well that’s good. Because you didn’t! And I’m
incredibly happy for ya!
(shocked) That’s mean! You really had me going there
(shocked) That’s mean! You really had me going there
Oh, we could do this all day
Oh, we could do this all day

Yeah, you’re right. Okay look, listen, let’s talk about what a
huge star I’m gonna be
You are gonna be a huge star! I’m gonna hug ya

lines.Character: [What follows is the final set of flashbacks that feature a whole lot of lovin’ between Chandler and Joey. There’s no words, just hugs and even the kiss from The One With The Monkey. All of this is set to the song, You’ve Really Got a Hold on Me
lines.Line: What follows is the final set of flashbacks that feature a whole lot of lovin’ between Chandler and Joey. There’s no words, just hugs and even the kiss from The One With The Monkey. All of this is set to the song, You’ve Really Got a Hold on Me!

lines.Character: [Cut back to the present, they are still in each other’s embrace
lines.Line: Cut back to the present, they are still in each other’s embrace.

Hey, do we do this too much
